Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Coliseum (Public Monster Rancher Tournaments): The Locker Room (Q&A): How..
By Stoopiddood9 on Sunday, November 11, 2007 - 06:10 pm:

Do the tournaments work, and what MR games are used for them? I only have MR2 and the GBA games... =/

By Lisa Shock on Monday, November 12, 2007 - 07:46 am:

There's no computer control of both monsters in the GBA games, so tourneys are impossible in those games.

The last few MR2 events were cancelled a couple of years ago due to a lack of entries.

We've got an MR1 event coming up, but, so far, I have two people's entries and there doesn't seem to be much interest. No one has replied to my inquiries about whether the dates and times I have available to hold the event are ok.

By Thorr on Wednesday, November 14, 2007 - 09:47 am:

Ok, I got the stuff. I think that I can take this monster and use a combination of the Shock treatment and the Vitamin overload to get her up to snuff. It beats starting over since she already has all of her techs and is way past her prime. She was pretty much my first monster and I am fairly certain I peached her. She is already 6 years old. If I dump all of my money into her, run my cash cow for a while, then give her the shock treatment for her last few stats, then I think she will be good to go.

By Thorr on Wednesday, November 14, 2007 - 12:04 pm:

Ok, so I have given her the shock treatment for her INT since there are no pills for INT and she only needed about 100 to max it out. I have been doing the item overload for her other stats, which costs a ridiculous amount of money, but works. But given the effect of pills on the monster's life span, I imagine that if I do anything with her right now, she'll die since she was already at at 5Y10M to start with. She is now 6Y4M. (It occurred to me that I had to do the Shock treatment first since I would have no lifespan after the pill overdose... Silly me didn't realize it until after my first round of meds, though, and I had to start over...)

I have some more pill-popping to go, but I believe I have enough money to make it work. I have about 120000 left.
